name: Binary@
description:
Binary@ lets you experience the beauty of binarism! Exciting features include:

  • Being cathegorised into the following real cathegories: RED and BLUE
  • A quiz-like experience for the whole family! Please enjoy with your family!

NOTE: Binarism is fundamental in life, do not try to balance out your redness and blueness during the quiz; there will be consequences.

Confused? More info here: http://binaryat.studiorenard.me/
